snippet: Part of the challenge of fighting the Islamic State is the difficulty of grasping the savagery of its acts.
abstract: Editorial contends Islamic State group stands alone in its deliberate, systematic and public savagery, and no other Islamist group has so nakedly adopted cult of sadism; warns that the world has not seen the last of group's horrors.
lead_paragraph: Part of the challenge of fighting the Islamic State is the difficulty of grasping the savagery of its acts.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
